summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSame iconic high hold formula; Special edition fragrance! Kenra Volume Spray 25 Coastal Breeze is a fragrance that sweeps through your hair, carrying the refreshing sea air blended with the essence of coconut, melon and amber.
details: DetailsBenefitsSuper hold up to 120 hours*High humidity resistance up to 72 hours**Wind resistant up to 25 MPHFlake-free finishFast-drying formula*vs. untreated hair in high humidity conditions**vs. untreated hairItem 2638840How To UseShake well. For super hold finish, hold can 8-10" from hair and spray over entire finished style in short bursts. To build volume, spray between layers at the base. If clogging occurs, remove nozzle and run stem under hot water.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Parfum (Fragrance), AMP-Isostearoyl Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, PEG/PPG-17/18 Dimethicone, Triethyl Citrate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Panthenol, Benzophenone-4, Benzoic Acid, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Alcohol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake well. For super hold finish, hold can 8-10" from hair and spray over entire finished style in short bursts. To build volume, spray between layers at the base. If clogging occurs, remove nozzle and run stem under hot water.

reviews.headline: Volume spray
reviews.comments: This is the only hair spray that I will use. Love it!

reviews.headline: Amazing hold
reviews.comments: This product is wonderful.  Light fragrance. Holds without gummy sticky residue.  Can comb through it. The other fragrance is lovely. I just wish it was a regular hairspray in the line as it states it is a limited edition.  I hope they add it in the line permanently.

reviews.headline: Lovely scent, fantastic hold
reviews.comments: This is the first time I've used this product and I'm LOVING it! Great hold and combs out easily before bedtime. My fine hair approves! Love the scent, clean and light.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This product works great  best I've used..

reviews.headline: Love the smell!
reviews.comments: I got this because when my hairstylist at Ulta used it on my hair it smelled sooooooo good! So I bought it for at home use!  I will say, spray on your hands and then put it in your hair.  I sprayed it directly into my hair and it made my hair feel like tacky hairspray.  But it does give volume when you spray it on your hands and fluff your roots.

reviews.headline: Wonderful scent
reviews.comments: I love the warm amber scent, still has moderate hold without being too stiff.  This smells very similar to an expensive perfume (Baccarate Rouge 540) that I love.  Nice for a layered scent without being overpowering once it is dry on my hair.

reviews.headline: I have used this product several times and will continue
reviews.comments: I have used Kenra professional hairspray 25 for quite some time and love this new offering. It works as well as the original with a little light fragrance added in.

reviews.headline: I would not buy again.
reviews.comments: Scent clashes with perfume. Too much.  Wonder if I can return.

reviews.headline: I am obsessed with this scent!!
reviews.comments: Holds just like the normal scent/unscented.  Not sure why others say it doesn't hold.  I love, love, love this scent.  I hope this isn't a limited edition scent.  I'm buying more just in case it is.  lol.

reviews.headline: Didn't care for the scent
reviews.comments: I love all the scents described on can, but couldn't tolerate it in my hair. Didn't hold my hair as well as Kenra 25 original.  Exchanged it for the original.

reviews.headline: BEST HAIRSPRAY BEST SCENT
reviews.comments: Kenra was so smart to make this into a new fragrance - it's so perfect for the summer & smells delicious!!! Kenra Hairspray for the win always - you are missing out if you're not using this hairspray - it's the OG!

reviews.headline: The smell is nice but doesn't hold
reviews.comments: The smell is nice, as others have stated but it was like I didn't even use hairspray. Doesn't hold well and I don't have a lot of hair to hold. Won't purchase again.

reviews.headline: Smells good, but no holding power
reviews.comments: I liked the idea of a coastal scent, however the scent isn't important if the spray doesn't hold my hair. I have short hair that needs a strong spray to hold the style. Shortly after spraying my hair, it has already started to droop. I will exchange it for the original.

reviews.headline: Kenra Volume Spray 25!!!
reviews.comments:
Ok. I have NO idea WHY I've never tried the Volume Spray 25 before! Of COURSE … it's KENRA so it's going to do what Kenra says it will! I took off one star b/c I cannot actually "smell" the Coastal Breeze scent. My hubby hasn't commented, either and he has a very good nose for scents … lol! 
I may try the other scent to see if it gives a better fragrance pay off. But the iconic Volume 25 Spray is a new keeper for me … special scents or just their usual!! 
Great hold. Great "style memory." Brushable. Pretty close to perfect!

reviews.headline: Does not hold like the Original
reviews.comments:
For some reason this scent doesn't hold
like the original Volume Spray 25. I checked the ingredients & they're slightly different. I love the holding power of the original Volume Spray 25 but can't stand the smell which is why I was excited to see this new scent. It's smells good but doesn't work nearly as well. I'll be exchanging for the original

faceoff_positive.comments:
Ok. I have NO idea WHY I've never tried the Volume Spray 25 before! Of COURSE … it's KENRA so it's going to do what Kenra says it will! I took off one star b/c I cannot actually "smell" the Coastal Breeze scent. My hubby hasn't commented, either and he has a very good nose for scents … lol! 
I may try the other scent to see if it gives a better fragrance pay off. But the iconic Volume 25 Spray is a new keeper for me … special scents or just their usual!! 
Great hold. Great "style memory." Brushable. Pretty close to perfect!
faceoff_positive.headline: Kenra Volume Spray 25!!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
For some reason this scent doesn't hold
like the original Volume Spray 25. I checked the ingredients & they're slightly different. I love the holding power of the original Volume Spray 25 but can't stand the smell which is why I was excited to see this new scent. It's smells good but doesn't work nearly as well. I'll be exchanging for the original
faceoff_negative.headline: Does not hold like the Original
